2521731792966111939.Text: Skooma is an illegal narcotic substance made from refined moon sugar. Criminals use it as a kind of currency. They say it makes you fast and strong, but clumsy and stupid. Of course, %Name wants nothing to do with breaking laws. That would be wrong.
